Articles.Content:
"It has come to my attention that we have landed on Eeloo. We'll need a new goal, the goal of the century. Gentlemen, let me unveil the newest manned mission. We will go to Marfik, a star system some 47,700 Kerbol-Kerbin Units and some good 3.9 light years from Kerbin. Prepare yourselves, for the journey of the century." - President Nedfred Q. Kerman, at the annual meeting of the International Astronautics Adminstration.

[MISSION PATCH COMING SHORTLY]

Chapter One: The Overview

The Interstellar Vehicle New Dawn, or "IV New Dawn" as they call it, is planned to be an state of the art spacecraft, constructed of the best alloys available to Kerbal-kind. The craft is equipped with the top technology that the superpowers of Kerbin can muster, and is built and staffed by an international crew, the best that Kerbin can offer.

"Interstellar Vehicle New Dawn"

Tonnage: 260 tons

Propulsion: Four powerful ion thrusters located at the front of the ship.

Crew Capacity: Twelve.

Electric Source: 16 Thermoelectric Nuclear Generators

Based Off: Valkeryie Starship

Resoources:

45000 Xenon Gas

30000 Electric Charge

2000 Monopropellant

4000 Oxidizer (Now used for breathing purposes)

2880 Liquid Fuel (Now used in the ship's cocktail bar)

Crew

Bob Kerman

Age: 45

Rank: Fleet Commadant, United Proviences Navy

Role: Mission Commander

Melwin Kerman

Age: 34

Rank: Lieutenant, United Proviences Navy

Role: Science Officer

Dr. Dozer Kerman

Age: 26

Rank: Kaptian, Loqed Republic Airforce

Role: Astrobiology

Dr. Dudgun Kerman

Age: 34

Rank: Lieutenant, United Proviences Airforce

Role: Astrophysicist

Johndan Kerman

Age: 18

Rank: Secondary Kaptian, Loqed Republic Navy

Role: Comminications Officer

Dr. Gusbas Kerman

Age: 44

Rank: Wing Commander, Imperial Empire Airforce

Role: Colonization Officer

Edlu Kerman

Age: 15

Rank: Lieutenant Colonel, Tierra Robadan Marines

Role: Pilot

AI Unit No.12

Age: 1

Rank: N/A

Role: AI

Objectives

Primary Objectives:

Enter Interstellar Space

Approach the Marfik system

Enter the Marfik System

Perform manned landing on Marfik Ac

Return to Kerbin

Chapter Two: Farewell to Kerbin

AI Unit No.12- "Begin thruster to approach estimated trajectory 0-44. Presaved Trajectory 0-44 loaded, ship is being moved. Moving to select course. Trajectory loaded, preparing for accleration stage,that is, if this bulky piece of steel and junk moves like its supposed too."

Dr. Gusbas- "HEY. I HEARD THAT."

AI Unit No.12- "Reporting major structural stress in Monopropellant Storage Section"

*crack*

Edlu Kerman- "Who made that noise?"

Johndan Kerman- "Lol, scared ya."

Edlu Kerman- "How the hell did you get Secondary Kaptian in the Navy like that?"

Johndan Kerman- "Ultra Skill."

Dr. Dozer- "Will you two boys just shut the **** up?"

AI Unit No.12- "The ship is experiencing major structural stress in-"

KSC- "Why the **** is the ship bending"

Melwin Kerman- "I want out."

Bob Kerman- "Too late. You signed up already."

Edlu Kerman- "The ship has reached an good spot for acclea-wait. Who the heck put the **** board upside down. Navball is messing up."

Bob Kerman- "Just fire the thrusters already."

Edlu- "Yes sir. Ion thrusters are go."

Bob Kerman- "Now to wait."

*cue very beautiful music*

Dr. Dozer Kerman- "Prepare to enter cryosleep for the accleration, lads. Unit 12, begin the cryostorage process for the crew"

AI Unit No.12- "What is your security clearence?"

Dr. Dozer Kerman- "Level-4. Begin the process"

Johndan Kerman- "But I don't wan-"

AI Unit No.12- "Cryosleep order confirmed. All crew will now enter cryosleep"

Johndan Kerman- "NOO-zzzzzzzzz"

Chapter Three: Interstellar Medium

AI Unit No.12- "Accleration complete. Awakening crew."

Edlu Kerman- "What the heck did I drink last night. Ahh...god, it hurs."

AI Unit No.12- "Welcome back. You are in Eeloo Orbit."

Johndan Kerman- "WHAT? IT TOOK THAT FRAKING LONG FOR IT TO ACCLERATE?"

AI Unit No.12- "I'm afraid so."

Bob Kerman- "Unit 12, please perform a systems check."

AI Unit No.12- "All systems are still go."

Melwin Kerman- "Ok. Affirmative. EVA preparations?"

AI Unit No.12- "What?. This is not according to orders. Security clearence?"

Melwin Kerman- "Level 5. That, is an order, Unit 12. I can have KSC disconnect you any time I want."

AI Unit No.12- *sigh* "Fine. Go ahead. Depressurizing Airlock 02."

Melwin Kerman- "I'm out. Edlu, secure the airlock."

Melwin Kerman- "I'm heading back. Open the airlock."

AI Unit No.12- "Ok. Airlock depresurized, you may enter."

Melwin Kerman- "Perfect"

Johndan Kerman- "Hey Melwin, check this out!"

Melwin Kerman- "Wha-oh holy mother of Kod. Are you dumping rocket fuel into your mouth and throwing in a matc-holy."

Edlu Kerman- "Uh, I'll leave. What's the speed, 12?"

AI Unit No.12- "You are going at 18,000 Kilometers per second. You will reach Marfik in um....40 years"

Bob Kerman- "I love this centerfuige. Gravity is going to be esstential if we are going to stay out here for long periods of time."

Dr. Dudgun Kerman- "The habitats being furnished rather "luxirily" by a space sense is a nice aftertouch, even tho-"

*CLANG*

Bob Kerman- "Edlu, grab a EVA suit and go check it out."

AI Unit No.12- "Object has impacted the whiffle shield. Checking on scale of damage. Damage is minor."

Edlu Kerman- "Yes sir. Unit, open the airlock for me."

AI Unit No.12- "Airlock is ready. Depressurizing airlock. You are ready to go, godspeed."

Edlu Kerman- "Thank- AHHHHH"

*crash*

Bob Kerman- "Dammit. Unit 12, get Edlu on the line"

AI Unit No.12- "Moderate damage with the centerfuigal truss. Edlu appears to have gotten himself hit by the truss."

Melwin Kerman- "Unit 12, get Edlu on the line."

Edlu Kerman- "AHHHHHH HELP ME"

Melwin Kerman- "Answer me! Is the ship in sight?"

Edlu Kerman- "I don't know! Where is it? My visor is badly cracked and my display is showing that I am leaking oxygen."

Melwin Kerman- "Try to stabllize yourself and slow down on the breathing. Edlu? Do you copy?"

Edlu Kerman- "I'm trying, oh kod, I'm trying, help...."

Bob Kerman- "Edlu! Stablize yourself! Is the mini ASAS in the EVA suit on?"

Edlu Kerman- "I think it got ripped of during the impa-"

Melwin Kerman- "Edlu! Do you copy? Come in! COME IN!"

Edlu Kerman- "Can't breathe. Kod help me, help me, I'm trying to stablize, can't, please hel- *static*"

AI Unit No.12- "All telemetry with EVA Suit 03 has ceased. Awaiting further instructions."

Bob Kerman- "Inform any related Kerbals of his status as "Missing". Make it "Missing", I don't want the world to know someone has died."

AI Unit No.12- "But that would be an dir-"

Bob Kerman- "Do it. Now."

AI Unit No.12- "I will relieve you from command, if this keeps happening."

Bob Kerman- "What?"

AI Unit No.12- "I am taking charge of the ship. You have shown that you are unfit for duty."

AI Unit No.12- "I wi- SYSTEM OVERRIDE. REBOOTING. MEMORY WIPE, YES NO?"

Bob Kerman- "Yes."

AI Unit No.12- "Hello, commander."

Melwin Kerman- "Had to reboot it before it went completely rogue. Sorry, sir."

Gusbas Kerman- "Two crewmembers down in a day, huh?"

Bob Kerman- "How did you get here?"

Gusbas Kerman- "I was looking for someplace to silent watch Hulu. The streaming and coverage sucks around here. Keep this trend up, and this thing will be a ghost ship by tomorrow."

Bob Kerman- "Unit 12, change pilot to Bob Kerman, transmit the information that Edlu Kerman is now "Missing in Action.""

AI Unit No.12- "Yes, sir."

"We have recieved news from the New Dawn Spacecraft today that Lieutenant Colonel Edlu Kerman is now "MIA", from an unfortunate accident while performing and spacewalk past the orbit of Eeloo. No further detail has been noticed, and Bob Kerman, the Mission Commander, is still pending for a comment. The Tierra Robodan goverment has stated its "sorrow at the loss of such a bright young Kerbal who had lots of potiental.". The goverment of the United Proviences could not be reached for comment."

Chapter Four: Endless Void

Edited September 14, 2013 by NASAFanboy

lol, four "powerful" ion thrusters

Im excited to see where this is going, a ship like that and its crew cant be perfect
I had to play with the CFG file a little to get the interstellar thing going.
And this is why ion thrusters are not a vital part of my space program. In fact, ion thrusters have no presence in my space program at all.

i use ion thrusters for all my LKO - MKO - HKO transfer tugs

avoids using tons of fuel

ps so far i like it!

Edited September 15, 2013 by popeter45
